name: Block Blast!
summary: "Block Blast!" is a free and popular block puzzle game that is your best choice when you want to pass the casual time and challenge your brain. The goal of this block puzzle game is easy yet fun: match and clear as many colored blocks as possible on the board. Mastering the skill of filling rows or columns will make the block puzzle game easier. "Block Blast!" not only provides a relaxing and cozy puzzle gaming experience but also enhances your logical abilities and trains your brain.
